Every 4 minutes a king of the hill style battle occurs. All participants get gold and the winning team gets extra gold.

Hi all! Art update will resume but is temporarily on hold. In the meantime I am continuing to make balance changes.

- New abilities for the Shore Guard 
 ---> No Fire Zone prevents all ships from using weapons in an aoe 
 ---> Rescue Mission is a burst healing projectile 
- Canoe might buffed (ministun added) 
- Shore Guard stun length increased 
- Tug Boat stun length increased 
- Tug Boat hook hit box size increased
